title: Civil rights lawyers and protesters return to LAX as the new Trump travel ban takes effect
text: "There's still a lot of confusion about how this affects people, how this affects family members," Qazi said. "The [visa] process is already so thorough and it's been that way for a very long time. To say someone can't come in because they're from a certain country…we know what this is about. This is about excluding Muslims as much as possible."
summary:
"There's still a lot of confusion about how this affects people, how this affects family members," Qazi said.
"The [visa] process is already so thorough and it's been that way for a very long time.
To say someone can't come in because they're from a certain country…we know what this is about.
This is about excluding Muslims as much as possible."
